Projects!

Image2Text

Worked with another developer intern and design intern to create webapp that converted handwritten words to online text (our team did not code the scanner)

Translation Exchange

Worked with team of 12 other interns to develop a full website supporting a mobile Bible translation application. Website allowed users to create profiles to import, export, edit, listen, comment and sort various files.

Open Air Challenge

Worked with team of 3 other SI students to develop an accessible website using wordpress for a non-profit organization.

Pipelined LC-2K

Created a cycle-accurate behavioral simulator for a pipelined implementation of the LC-2K (8 register, 32-bit computer), complete with data forwarding and simple branch prediction (EECS 370).
(Didn't have a picture so I included a photo of my favorite fast food)

IKEA Place Usability Test

Part of team that conducted in-depth surveying, testing and analysis of IKEA's augmented reality application (Part of SI 422).

206 API Project

Learned to use API's from Facebook and Youtube to manipulate data (Part of SI 206) (Couldn't find a suitable photo so used the album cover of my current favorite song)

Instagram (Fake)

Created "Instagram" using static html pages and templates (Part of EECS 485).
